metadata.title: W3Schools.com
metadata.Keywords: HTML, Python, CSS, SQL, JavaScript, How to, PHP, Java, C, C++, C#, jQuery, Bootstrap, Colors, W3.CSS, XML, MySQL, Icons, NodeJS, React, Graphics, Angular, R, AI, Git, Data Science, Code Game, Tutorials, Programming, Web Development, Training, Learning, Quiz, Exercises, Courses, Lessons, References, Examples, Learn to code, Source code, Demos, Tips, Website
metadata.Description: Well organized and easy to understand Web building tutorials with lots of examples of how to use HTML, CSS, JavaScript, SQL, PHP, Python, Bootstrap, Java and XML.
metadata.og:description: W3Schools offers free online tutorials, references and exercises in all the major languages of the web. Covering popular subjects like HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Python, SQL, Java, and many, many more.
metadata.keywords: HTML, Python, CSS, SQL, JavaScript, How to, PHP, Java, C, C++, C#, jQuery, Bootstrap, Colors, W3.CSS, XML, MySQL, Icons, NodeJS, React, Graphics, Angular, R, AI, Git, Data Science, Code Game, Tutorials, Programming, Web Development, Training, Learning, Quiz, Exercises, Courses, Lessons, References, Examples, Learn to code, Source code, Demos, Tips, Website

content.text: Go Exercises
Introduction
The W3Schools Go Tutorial is comprehensive and beginner-friendly.
content.html: The W3Schools Go Tutorial is comprehensive and beginner-friendly.

content.text: It will give you a fundamental knowledge of Go programming.
content.html: It will give you a fundamental knowledge of Go programming.

content.text: It is designed for beginners and requires no prior programming experience.
content.html: It is designed for beginners and requires no prior programming experience.

content.text: The content has been carefully made to be bite-sized, simple, and easy to understand.
content.html: The content has been carefully made to be bite-sized, simple, and easy to understand.

content.text: The content has been proven by millions of users over the years. It is updated and improved frequently.
content.html: The content has been proven by millions of users over the years. It is updated and improved frequently.

content.text: The syllabus outline and its sequence are structured so you can learn Go step by step, from the introduction to advanced features.
content.html: The syllabus outline and its sequence are structured so you can learn Go step by step, from the introduction to advanced features.

content.text: Get Started With Go »
content.html: Get Started With Go »

content.text: Learning Outcomes

Note: Are you a teacher teaching Go? W3Schools Academy is a toolbox of features that can help you teach. It offers classroom features such as pre-built study plans, classroom administration and much more. Read more about Academy here .
content.html: Note: Are you a teacher teaching Go? W3Schools Academy is a toolbox of features that can help you teach. It offers classroom features such as pre-built study plans, classroom administration and much more. Read more about Academy here.

Get Started
content.html: Get Started

content.text: Sandbox and Lab Environment
Go, like any programming language, is best learned through hands-on practice.
content.html: Go, like any programming language, is best learned through hands-on practice.

content.text: Try this example using our editor:
content.html: Try this example using our editor:

content.code_html:
package main
import ("fmt")

func main() {
  fmt.Println("Hello World!")
}

content.text: The Try It's Yourself feature is available for you to throughout the tutorial.
content.html: The Try It's Yourself feature is available for you to throughout the tutorial.

content.text: Go Certification
W3Schools offers an end-of-pathway certification program.
content.html: W3Schools offers an end-of-pathway certification program.

content.text: Here you can take exams to get certified.
content.html: Here you can take exams to get certified.

content.text: The Go exam is a test that summarizes the W3Schools Go syllabus.
content.html: The Go exam is a test that summarizes the W3Schools Go syllabus.

content.text: After passing the exam you get the "Certified Go Developer" Certification.
content.html: After passing the exam you get the "Certified Go Developer" Certification.

content.text: The certification exam is adaptive and graded; students will get a grade from intermediate, advanced to professional.
content.html: The certification exam is adaptive and graded; students will get a grade from intermediate, advanced to professional.

content.text: Buy Certificate »
content.html: Buy Certificate »

content.text: Are You a Teacher?
Are you interested in learning how you can use W3Schools Academy to Teach Go?
content.html: Are you interested in learning how you can use W3Schools Academy to Teach Go?

content.text: Watch a demo of W3Schools Academy . You'll see how it works, and discover how it can make teaching programming easier and more engaging.
content.html: Watch a demo of W3Schools Academy. You'll see how it works, and discover how it can make teaching programming easier and more engaging.
